dependencies.@js-temporal/polyfill: Remove this dependency once all supported Node.js versions have adopted TC39â€™s Temporal proposal.
dependencies.env-paths: Replace the <=2.x restriction with the latest stable version once Jest offers stable support for ESM. See also: https://jestjs.io/docs/ecmascript-modules

devDependencies.@types/node: Keep this pinned to the Node.js major version specified in `engines`
devDependencies.typescript: Restricted for compatibility with `eslint-plugin`; when upgrading both, run `yarn lint` to re-check.

scripts.clean: yarn run -B del dist lib types
scripts.repatch: git add -- package.json && yarn patch-commit -s "$1" && git checkout -- package.json && yarn clean-install
scripts.test: yarn run -B tsc && yarn run -B jest
